price: Sε mohyε (adeε wͻ bͻtͻ anaasε konku mu) a monhyε ma εnyε mma, na monfa nsania a εyε nsusu (adeε mma amanfoͻ). Saa na εyε, εna (εma) awieε pa.
arabic: وَأَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ إِذَا كِلۡتُمۡ وَزِنُواْ بِٱلۡقِسۡطَاسِ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمِۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ وَأَحۡسَنُ تَأۡوِيلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-awfū al-kayla idhā kil'tum wazinū bil-qis'ṭāsi al-mus'taqīmi dhālika khayrun wa-aḥsanu tawīlan
